content.question: How many degrees of freedom should be used when looking up the critical value for a chi-square analysis of the ratios of phenotypes observed among the <math alttext="F 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> offspring versus the expected phenotypic ratio assuming independent assortment?
